prompts.welcome: Hi! I'm here to help you get in touch with Vocaid. Let's start with your name.
prompts.name: What's your name?
prompts.subject:
What would you like to discuss? Please choose a topic:

‚Ä¢ General Inquiry
‚Ä¢ Technical Support
‚Ä¢ Billing Question
‚Ä¢ Feedback
‚Ä¢ Partnership Opportunity
‚Ä¢ Other
prompts.message: Great! Now, please describe your question or message (50-250 characters).
prompts.review: Here's a summary of your message. Ready to send? Type "yes" to confirm or "edit [field]" to make changes.
prompts.success: Your message has been sent successfully! We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.
prompts.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Would you like to try again?
prompts.invalidSubject:
I didn't recognize that subject. Please choose from:
‚Ä¢ General Inquiry
‚Ä¢ Technical Support
‚Ä¢ Billing Question
‚Ä¢ Feedback
‚Ä¢ Partnership Opportunity
‚Ä¢ Other
prompts.editField: Sure, let's update that. What would you like to change it to?
prompts.cancelled: No problem! What would you like to edit? You can say 'edit name', 'edit email', 'edit subject', or 'edit message'.
prompts.confirmHelp: Please type 'yes' to send your message, or 'edit [field]' to make changes.

betaFeedback.title: Beta Feedback
betaFeedback.welcome: Hi! üëã I'm here to collect your feedback during our closed beta. What would you like to share?
betaFeedback.bugTitle: Got it! What's a brief title for this bug?
betaFeedback.featureTitle: Great! What's a brief title for your feature idea?
betaFeedback.bugTitlePlaceholder: e.g., Button not working on mobile
betaFeedback.bugDescription: Please describe the bug in more detail. What happened?
betaFeedback.featureDescription: Please describe your feature idea in more detail.
betaFeedback.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide as much detail as you can...
betaFeedback.stepsQuestion: What steps lead to this bug? (Enter each step, press Enter, then click 'Done' when finished)
betaFeedback.expectedQuestion: What did you expect to happen?
betaFeedback.goalQuestion: What problem would this feature solve for you?
betaFeedback.targetUserQuestion: Who would benefit from this feature?
betaFeedback.priorityQuestion: How important is this feature to you?
betaFeedback.alternativesQuestion: Have you tried any workarounds or alternatives? (optional)
betaFeedback.emailQuestion: What's your email so we can follow up if needed?
betaFeedback.followUpQuestion: Can we contact you about this feedback?
betaFeedback.reviewMessage: Here's a summary of your feedback:
betaFeedback.successMessage:
Thank you! Your feedback has been submitted. üéâ

We really appreciate you helping us improve Vocaid!

scoreExplanation.title: How we calculate your score:
scoreExplanation.desc: Our AI analyzes your interview responses across four key dimensions‚Äîcontent quality, communication skills, confidence level, and technical knowledge. Each category is rated on a 0‚Äì100% scale based on industry standards and best practices. The overall score is a weighted average reflecting your comprehensive interview performance.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Vocaid.

whatIsVocaid.question: What is Vocaid?
whatIsVocaid.answer: Vocaid is an AI-powered interview platform. Today, we offer B2C Interview Practice‚Äîpractice interviews with AI, get instant feedback, and track your progress. Coming soon: our B2B Recruiter Platform for structured candidate evaluations and an HR Employee Hub for AI-powered HR support.

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: New users receive free credits to get started. Each completed practice interview uses 1 credit. You can purchase more credits anytime through our billing page. Credits never expire, so use them at your own pace. Subscription plans may be offered in the future.

multilingual.question: Which languages are supported?
multilingual.answer: Vocaid supports interviews in 7 languages: English, Chinese, Hindi, Spanish, Portuguese, French, and Russian. The AI conducts the entire interview and generates feedback in your chosen language. You can select your preferred language before each interview.

resumeRepository.question: Can I upload multiple resumes and choose one per interview?
resumeRepository.answer: Yes! Vocaid includes a Resume Repository where you can upload and store multiple resumes. Before each interview, you can select which resume to use, and our AI will tailor questions based on your experience. This is perfect if you're targeting different roles or industries.

linkedinImport.question: Can I import my LinkedIn profile?
linkedinImport.answer: LinkedIn import is available in supported regions. Where available, you can quickly import your professional experience from LinkedIn to create a resume in Vocaid. Alternatively, you can upload your resume as a PDF or DOCX file.

privacy.question: How do you handle my data and privacy?
privacy.answer: We take your privacy seriously. Your resumes and interview responses are stored securely and encrypted. You have full control over your data‚Äîyou can view, export, or request deletion at any time from your account settings. We never share your personal data with third parties without your consent.

support.question: How do I get support?
support.answer: Use the in-app feedback button to report a bug or request a feature. For account or billing help, contact us at support@vocaid.ai. During closed beta, response times may be limited.

rubrics.question: Can recruiters customize interview rubrics and scorecards?
rubrics.answer: Yes‚ÄîVocaid's Recruiter Platform (coming soon) will let organizations configure rubrics, competencies, and structured scorecards with evidence timestamps for consistent, auditable evaluations.
